event.doc_name: Order Approving and Entering Consent Decree

evidence.source_document: Order Approving and Entering Consent Decree

evidence.text: Within six months of the Effective Date, the Jail will consult with the Monitor to draft and/or revise policies and procedures to incorporate and align them with the provisions in this Agreement.

add_extracted.value: Within six months of the Effective Date, the Jail will consult with the Monitor to draft and/or revise policies and procedures to incorporate and align them with the provisions in this Agreement.

evidence.text: Within one year of the Effective Date, all policies and procedures that needed to be drafted and/or revised to incorporate and align them with the provisions in this Agreement will be adopted by the Jail.

add_extracted.value: Within one year of the Effective Date, all policies and procedures that needed to be drafted and/or revised to incorporate and align them with the provisions in this Agreement will be adopted by the Jail.

evidence.text: To meet the requirements of this Agreement and ensure that prisoners receive constitutionally adequate medical care, the Jail will increase medical staffing by hiring sufficient additional staff with appropriate credentials (e.g., MDs, RNs, and LPNs) and increasing the hours that current staff with higher credentials are onsite on evenings and weekends.

add_extracted.value: The Jail will increase medical staffing by hiring sufficient additional staff with appropriate credentials and increasing hours that current staff with higher credentials are onsite on evenings and weekends.

evidence.text: The Jail will provide constitutionally adequate medical care.

add_extracted.value: The Jail will provide constitutionally adequate medical care and suicide prevention practices.

evidence.text: Jail Staff will ensure that restrictive housing is not used as an alternative to adequate mental health care and treatment.

add_extracted.value: The Jail will ensure that restrictive housing is not used as an alternative to adequate mental health care and treatment.

evidence.text: This Agreement will terminate in five years, or earlier, if the Parties agree that HRRJ has attained substantial compliance with all provisions of this Agreement and maintained that compliance for a period of one year, or as outlined in Paragraph 167, by order of the Court.

args.reason: All 3 checklist items fully extracted with evidence from existing documents. No further documents need review as all relevant values are present in the Agreement and Order documents already processed.
